title: Bloomberg Markets: Alpha Approach to Factor Investing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Alpha Approach to Factor Investing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Chris Meredith Head of Research and Senior Portfolio Manager O'shaughnessy Asset Management Discussing the markets and building concentrated portfolios with a factor edge.
